statements: SELECT * FROM buildings
SELECT building_name, energy_consumption FROM buildings
SELECT building_name, building_address FROM buildings WHERE energy_consumption > 1000
SELECT * FROM buildings WHERE last_reading_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT building_name, building_address FROM buildings ORDER BY building_name DESC
SELECT building_id, building_name, building_address FROM buildings;
SELECT building_id, building_address, energy_consumption FROM buildings WHERE energy_consumption > 1000;
SELECT building_name, energy_consumption, last_reading_date FROM buildings WHERE last_reading_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM buildings ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_energy FROM buildings GROUP BY building_name HAVING avg_energy > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Buildings;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT building_id, building_name, address FROM Buildings WHERE building_name = 'Office Building';
SELECT building_name, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM Buildings JOIN EnergyConsumption ON Buildings.building_id = EnergyConsumption.building_id GROUP BY building_name;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings WHERE building_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, energy_usage FROM Buildings LEFT JOIN EnergyConsumption ON Buildings.building_id = EnergyConsumption.building_id WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT building_name, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM Buildings INNER JOIN EnergyConsumption ON Buildings.building_id = EnergyConsumption.building_id GROUP BY building_name HAVING SUM(energy_usage) > 5000;

SELECT building_name, AVG(energy_usage) AS average_energy_usage FROM Buildings LEFT JOIN EnergyConsumption ON Buildings.building_id = EnergyConsumption.building_id GROUP BY building_name ORDER BY average_energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM Building;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Building WHERE estimated_capacity > 100;
SELECT building_name, address, estimated_capacity FROM Building WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Building WHERE building_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT building_name, estimated_capacity FROM Building WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Building WHERE estimated_capacity > 100;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Building WHERE estimated_capacity <= 200;
SELECT b.building_name, COUNT(ec.consumption_id) AS consumption_count FROM Building b LEFT JOIN ElectricityConsumption ec ON b.building_id = ec.building_id GROUP BY b.building_name;
SELECT b.building_name, AVG(cf.carbon_tons) AS avg_carbon_footprint FROM Building b JOIN CarbonFootprint cf ON b.building_id = cf.building_id GROUP BY b.building_name;

SELECT b.building_name, ec.month, ec.year, cf.carbon_tons FROM Building b INNER JOIN ElectricityConsumption ec ON b.building_id = ec.building_id INNER JOIN CarbonFootprint cf ON b.building_id = cf.building_id WHERE ec.consumption_kwh > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Buildings;
SELECT building_name, building_address FROM Buildings WHERE building_size > 1000;
SELECT building_name, building_size FROM Buildings ORDER BY building_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption_value > 500;
SELECT building_name, efficiency_rating FROM Buildings JOIN EnergyEfficiency ON Buildings.building_id = EnergyEfficiency.building_id;
SELECT building_name, building_address, building_size FROM Buildings;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY consumption_value DESC;
SELECT building_name, SUM(consumption_value) AS total_consumption FROM Buildings INNER JOIN EnergyConsumption ON Buildings.building_id = EnergyConsumption.building_id GROUP BY building_name;
SELECT report_id, report_date, LEFT(report_content, 50) AS short_content FROM Reports WHERE LENGTH(report_content) > 100;

SELECT building_name, AVG(efficiency_rating) AS avg_rating FROM Buildings INNER JOIN EnergyEfficiency ON Buildings.building_id = EnergyEfficiency.building_id GROUP BY building_name HAVING avg_rating > 8;
SELECT * FROM buildings
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings
SELECT building_id, building_name, address FROM buildings WHERE building_id = 1
SELECT * FROM energy_meters
SELECT meter_id, meter_type FROM energy_meters
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings;
SELECT meter_type, building_id FROM energy_meters ORDER BY meter_type ASC;
SELECT reading_timestamp, reading_value FROM energy_readings WHERE reading_value > 100 ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT building_id, report_date, efficiency_rating, carbon_footprint FROM reports WHERE efficiency_rating >= 0.8 AND carbon_footprint <= 50 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
